title: Quick Question about Champion Icons in-game
body: If I'm using a skin, why isn't there a skin icon to represent me in-game? Is it only me who gets confused when a 'Blood Moon Shen' kills me and the kill feed doesn't show a demonic mask but rather a ninja? There are more skins that have that feels but bear with me. So, why not use a different icon for the champion if they are using a skin?

replies.body: For clarity Riot keeps all the champion icons as their default.
